comment: She's condescending and wastes a lot of class time trying to get the class to guess the answer to her vague questions. Almost half of each class period is spent on talking about the news. Lectures tended to be very broad and uninformative (though I will admit they got better at the end) You have to read the the book and teach yourself to do well.
Very tough.... But the work was enjoyable. Do exactly what she says, you should be fine, just don't expect anything higher than a B on any given assignment.
VERY tough grader. Make sure to read the required material before class because she has a keen sense of who hasn't read and will call you out.

One of the hardest history classes ever.  Took every single paper to the writing lab and got nothing higher than a C+ (I am NOT a C student)She is no help and grades ridiculously. Take someone else and RUN

Dr. McKinzey is a very strict, by the book professor. She will make you WORK hard for the grade (God forbid). I bombed the first paper and a quiz, but came out with a B in the class. Expect to do a ton of reading and get ready to write a paper a week. When you come out of the class with a "B" pat yourself on the back! It was hard but worth it!

The hardest and most by the book history teacher i have ever had.  Sometimes its respectable how much dedication she has to high standards of the required work.  More often than not, its annoying that she is a history teacher and grades everything with more of a fine tooth comb than any literature teacher ive ever had.
